lines.text:
[singing]
You've got to lick it, before you kick it! You've got to make it soft and wet before you stick it!
So Lysti, can I ask you a hypothetical question? Have you ever had a man wait seven weeks to "hit that"?
What're you asking HER for? She never made a man wait thirty minutes.

[sniff sniff]
Do I smell a whore?

[angry at store owners]
Ya see? This is why I'm in favor of the Immigration Reform Program, because you mothafuckas are straight off the boat, and you're already fuckin' with people!
Listen, ya Pakistani pieces of shit! Give me all the money in the drawer!

[offended]
We are not Pakistanis! We are Punjabis!
I could pass for Pakistani.
Did you see his hair? Motherfucker look like Predator!
[Lysterine does not approve of the man smoking in the Chinese Restaurant]
I'll take care of this.
[walks to man's table]

[in Chinese]
Excuse me, Sir. If you don't put out the smoke, my boy and I won't be getting any ass tonight.

[in Chinese]
Oh? No problem.
[puts out smoke]

[in Chinese]
You're the man!
[walks back to their table]

[smiling]
Heh heh... I guess you thought I was just some common ol' hoodrat, huh?

[in Chinese]
Oh I still do.
Next day you go to pick her up, you're all happy and shit, but is high noon, she comes outta house and a fucking seadonkey clunks into your car!
Hey Bunz, you got any condoms?
I'm without contraceptives, so please... leave me the f**k alone.
